mapper.select: SELECT * FROM free_board ORDER BY regdate DESC
SELECT * FROM free_board ORDER BY regdate DESC, bno DESC LIMIT 10;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM free_board WHERE bno = #{bno} and writer = #{writer}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_board (title, writer, contents) VALUES (#{title}, #{writer}, #{contents})
mapper.update: UPDATE free_board SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents} WHERE bno = #{bno}
UPDATE free_board SET viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
UPDATE free_board SET ccnt = ccnt + 1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
UPDATE free_board SET ccnt = ccnt - 1 WHERE bno = #{bno}

choose.otherwise: title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR contents LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
